translation:
I inform Your Excellency Lieutenant Isaías Antônio Alz., Ensign Antônio Joaquim da Cruz, Antônio José de Carvalho, and 16 soldiers, all from my command, to Passo Fundo in order to surprise a guard of the rebels that was there, commanded by Lieutenant Nogueira, capturing 4 prisoners and taking 6 saddled horses, while more people escaped into the woods.

This is what I have the honor to communicate to Your Excellency on December 17, 1839.
